ygData.subject: Cancelling Accounts
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, I was not aware of that fact that old accounts are actually not deleted. I have always heard and read that old accounts are only left available for six
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, I was not aware of that fact that old accounts are actually not deleted.
I have always heard and read that old accounts are only left available for
six months, but perhaps they only say that so that people won't stop playing
the game, or to make more money when people do stop playing, by making them
believe that they have to buy the CDs all over again. Thanks for bringing
this to my attention though. :o)

-= Mippon - 40 Halfling Druid =-
-= Nevfalath - 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
-= Areznia - 6 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
